questions.question: Virat Kohli has won the ICC Cricketer of the Year award multiple times.
MS Dhoni was awarded the Padma Bhushan by the Indian government.
Shane Warne was inducted into the ICC Hall of Fame.
Ben Stokes won the BBC Sports Personality of the Year award.
Sachin Tendulkar was awarded the Bharat Ratna, India's highest civilian honor.
Ricky Ponting has never won the Allan Border Medal.
Ellyse Perry has won the Belinda Clark Award multiple times.
Jacques Kallis was named one of Wisden's Five Cricketers of the Year.
Kapil Dev received a knighthood from the British government.
Mithali Raj has received the Arjuna Award from India.
